text: Greetings, respected members of the search committee. I am Nikesh Chachadiya, currently pursuing M.Tech in Computational and Data Sciences Department at Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore.
I am seeking a job in AI, ML and Data Science studies.
Before starting my current journey, I completed my BS-MS 12th degree in Mathematics with a minor in Data Science and Engineering at the Institute of Science Education and Research in Bhopal.
During this time, I became very interested in Data Science, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence.
My studies mainly focus on Mathematics, especially Probability Theory and Graph Theory which are crucial for Machine Learning and Deep Learning.
My MSc project was about Random Simplified Complexes.
It explored how random graphs work in higher dimensions and their use in higher dimensional networks and topological data analysis.

Yet just learning theory wasn enough I worked on various practical projects alongside my studies This ranged from computer vision and natural language processing to machine learning For example I built support vector machine and came in clustering algorithms from scratch
showing my skills in algorithm development and problem solving. I also did projects on image
compression using singular value decomposition and created a convolutional neural network to
decode captures with high accuracy. Furthermore, I have received several awards during my academic
journey like Mukti Mantri, Melhalla Vidyarthi Fellowship and good scores in national level
exams such as GATE and CSIRNET, GRF. Overall, my mix of theoretical knowledge,
practical skills and a strong desire for excellence makes me a good fit for the AIML
data science role at your esteemed organization. I am excited about the chance to share my expertise
and work with your team to bring innovation and make meaningful contribution to the field.
Thank you for considering my application. I eagerly await the opportunity to discuss further
how I can contribute to your team. Thank you.
